revised_title: Papers Read to the Royal Society: June 17, 1897
tldr: This article presents a list of papers read to the Royal Society on June 17, 1897, covering various topics in neuroscience, spectroscopy, astronomy, physics, and chemistry. The papers discuss research on cerebro-cortical afferent and efferent tracts, the behavior of calcium spectrum lines, enhanced lines, lunar and solar periodicities of earthquakes, and more.
